targets.query: SELECT sum("count")  / 60 FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "application" fill(null)

panels.description: Application  Requests Timed and Slowest Top 10  Duration

targets.query: SELECT sum("sum") FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "application" fill(0)

panels.title: Application RT

panels.description: 每分钟应用、实例调用的异常次数

targets.query: SELECT sum("count") FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE ("exception" != 'None') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "application" fill(null)

panels.title: Application Errors Rate(Errors / Minute)

targets.query: SELECT sum("count")  / 10 FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)
SELECT sum("count")  / 10 FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count")  / 10 FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "uri" fill(none)

panels.description: All HTTP Requests Timed and Slowest Top 10  Duration

targets.query: SELECT sum("sum")  / sum("count") FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10m), "uri" fill(0)

panels.title: All Requests Timed

panels.description: HTTP Requests Count  and Top 10 Requests

targets.query: SELECT sum("count") FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("count") FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "uri" fill(null)

panels.title: Requests Count

targets.query: SELECT mean("90_percentile") FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(0)
SELECT percentile("mean", 90) FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0)
SELECT percentile("mean", 99.9) FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0)
SELECT percentile("mean", 99.9) FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0)
SELECT percentile("mean", 99.9) FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0)
SELECT percentile("mean", 99.9) FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0)
SELECT percentile("mean", 99.9) FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0)
SELECT percentile("mean", 50) FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE ("uri" = '/v1/user/home') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0)
SELECT "90_percentile" FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(0)
SELECT sum("count")  / 10 FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)
SELECT sum("count")  / 10 FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)

SELECT sum("count")  / 10 FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(none)

targets.query: SELECT sum("count") FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE ("uri" = '/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "status" fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES   FROM "jvm_memory_used" WITH KEY = "application"
